Name: Hillbeetle
Text: Guh . . . fine, you win. You're clearly better. My onion is yours.

Name: Apicurio
Text: What? I don't want your onion. I just want you to stop using magic irresponsibly!

Name: Apicurio
Text: All your plant-growing magic is wreaking [wave]serious[/wave] havoc on the magical weave!

Name: Apicurio
Text: Didn't you think it was strange that your onion had become a nexus of magical power?

Name: Hillbeetle
Text: Wuh? Necksus? I just bestowed upon my onion the gift of love, kisses, and sweet nothings.

Name: Apicurio
Text: Alright, well, whatever. Just please stop filling your crops up with magical energy. Or I'll come back.

Name: Hillbeetle
Text: Fine. Less affection. Didn't know you worked for the LOVE POLICE. Sheesh.

Name: Apicurio
Text: Right. Good. I don't want to have to come back here.
